name: Disgruntled (MargoMarshmallow)
description:
Enforce your political position in this little pixel-stylized game. Clowns are not funny anymore? Then gather people and show them, that you need changes… And cats… And probably more beer, NOW.
- Gather as much people as you can.
- Beware of the local bonk-dispensing units, they will be hunting for you.
- They will also try to recruit local population to improve their strength. Don't let that happen!

Controls: WASD and your immense sociopolitical will
